EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_CF Summit Germany_Q415.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date: Cloud Foundry Summit Berlin Nov 2-3
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://berlin2015.cfsummit.com/attend> As software transforms industries across the world, more companies are embracing software as core competency to differentiate themselves with customers and capture new opportunities. But how do you get there? What technology and cultural best practices should you adopt?
Join Joshua McKenty, co-founder of OpenStack and FIeld CTO of Cloud Foundry at Pivotal and James Watters, VP and GM of Pivotal’s Cloud Platform Group at the inaugural Cloud Foundry Summit Europe <http://berlin2015.cfsummit.com/> for a candid conversation about the cloud native enterprise and how you can leverage Cloud Foundry to drive real innovation for your business.
James Watters VP GM Cloud Platform Group at Pivotal
Joshua McKenty Field CTO of Cloud Foundry at Pivotal
McKenty and Watters will be joined onstage by Cloud Foundry users, technology leaders and open source luminaries. We’ll be sharing more speaker names soon so stay tuned for future emails!
The Cloud Foundry Summit will take place in Berlin, Germany on November 2-3, 2015. It’s a great opportunity to spend time with more than 600+ developers, cloud operators and managers using the industry's Open Source Platform-as-a-Service standard: Cloud Foundry.
Register <http://www.cfsummit.com/> now to be a part of this important event!
